Translations.Text: jab aakaash phat jaayega
aur apane paalanahaar kee sunega aur yahee use karana bhee chaahiye
tatha jab dharatee phaila dee jaayegee
aur jo usake bheetar hai, phaink degee tatha khaalee ho jaayegee
aur apane paalanahaar kee sunegee aur yahee use karana bhee chaahiye
he insaan! vastutah, too apane paalanahaar se milane ke lie parishram kar raha hai aur too usase avashy milega
phir jis kisee ko usaka karmapatr daahine haath mein diya jaayega
to usaka saral haisaab liya jaayega

to vah vinaash (mrtyu) ko pukaarega
tatha narak mein jaayega
vah apanon mein prasann rahata tha
usane socha tha ki kabhee palat kar nahin aayega
kyon nahin? nishchay usaka paalanahaar use dekh raha tha
main sandhya laalima kee shapath leta hoon
tatha raat kee aur jise vah ekatr kare
tatha chaand kee, jab vah poora ho jaaye
phir tum avashy ek dasha se doosaree dasha mein savaar hoge
phir kyon ve vishvaas nahin karate
aur jab unake paas quraan padha jaata hai, to sajda nahin karate
balki kaafir to use jhuthalaate hain
aur allaah unake vichaaron ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai
atah, unhen duhkhadaayee yaatana kee shubh soochana de do
parantu, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake lie samaapt na hone vaala badala hai
shapath hai burjon vaale aakaash kee
shapash hai us din kee, jisaka vachan diya gaya
shapath hai saakshee kee aur jisapar saakshy dega
khaeeyon vaalon ka naash ho gaya
jinamen bhadakate hue eendhan kee agni thee
jabaki ve unapar baithe hue the
aur ve eemaan vaalon ke saath jo kar rahe the, use dekh rahe the
aur unaka dosh keval yahee tha ki ve prabhaavee prashansa kiye allaah ke prati vishvaas kiye hue the
jo aakaashon tatha dharatee ke raajy ka svaamee hai aur allaah sab kuchh dekh raha hai
jinhonne eemaan laane vaale nar naariyon ko pareeksha mein daala, phir kshama yaachana na kee, unake lie narak ka dand tatha bhadakatee aag kee yaatana hai
vaastav mein, jo eemaan laaye aur sadaachaar bane, unake lie aise svarg hain, jinake tale naharen bah rahee hain aur yahee badee saphalata hai
nishchay tere paalanahaar kee pakad bahut kadee hai
vahee pahale paida karata hai aur phir doosaree baar paida karega
aur vah ati kshama tatha prem karane vaala hai
vah sinhaasan ka mahaan svaamee hai
vah jo chaahe karata hai
he nabee! kya tumhen senaon kee soochana milee
firaun tatha samood ko
balki kaafir (vishvaasaheen) jhuthalaane mein lage hue hain
aur allaah unhen har or se ghere hue hai
balki, vah gaurav vaala quraan hai
jo lekhapatr (lauhe mahfooz) mein surakshit hai
shapath hai aakaash tatha raat mein "prakaash pradaan karane vaale" kee
aur tum kya jaano ki vah "raat mein prakaash pradaan karane vaala" kya hai
vah jyotimay sitaara hai
pratyek praanee par ek rakshak hai
insaan, ye to vichaar kare ki vah kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
uchhalate paanee (veery) se paida kiya gaya hai
jo peeth tatha seene ke panjaron ke madhs se nikalata hai
nishchay vah, use lautaane kee shakti rakhata hai
jis din man ke bhed parakhe jaayenge
to use na koee bal hoga aur na usaka koee sahaayak
shapath hai aakaash kee, jo barasata hai
tatha phatane vaalee dharatee kee

hansee kee baat nahin
vah chaal baazee karate hain

atah, kaafiron ko kuchh thoda avasar de do
